name: Kickoff Meeting
description: Initial meeting to discuss project goals and timeline.

name: Code Review Session
description: Reviewing the latest code changes and discussing improvements.

name: Project Demo
description: Demonstrating the new features implemented in the project.

name: Bug Fixing Sprint
description: Dedicated time to identify and fix bugs in the application.

name: Client Presentation
description: Presenting the project progress to the client and gathering feedback.

name: Team Building Event
description: An event to strengthen team relationships through fun activities.
